name: Abir
review: For this kind of money I expected the dam watch to keep a correct time. This thing is always 10 min behind?!!! I took it in for warranty repair 3 times already for the same issue.ðŸ˜‰

name: Tuhin
review: Having wanted a Rolex since I was a teenager, I found a used one an got an elderly watchmaker to teach me how to service it completely. The quality is outstanding, inside and out.

name: Asif
review: I have had a few of these over the years, two date and one no date, and have to say they are the best Rolex to invest in and wear. They are perfect for everyday use and dependable as the day is long.
